hadiths.text: Narrated Imran ibn Husayn: A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: My son has died; what do I receive from his estate? He replied: You receive a sixth. When he turned away he called him and said: You receive another sixth. When he turned away, he called him and said: The other sixth is an allowance (beyond what is due). Qatadah said: They (the Companions) did not know the heirs with whom he was given (a sixth). Qatadah said: The minimum share given to the grandfather was a sixth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مِيرَاثِ الْجَدِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Grandfather's Inheritance
